Headline: No trains between Howard and Belmont
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to a mechanical problem on a train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to a mechanical problem on a train.

As a result, trains are operating only between 95th and Belmont at this time.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include the #22 Clark bus or the #151 Sheridan bus.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow and Purple Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Yellow and Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow and Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a mechanical problem on a train

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: the #97 Skokie bus, the #201 Central/Ridge bus.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
